alert.note: Alert for Hampton; Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 20 at 5:09PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT FOR PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT...HAMPTON...COLLETON AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 509 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over White Hall, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include: Yemassee, Hendersonville, Green Pond, Gardens Corner, Sheldon, Ashepoo, Pocotaligo, Ritter, and White Hall. This warning includes I-95 in South Carolina between mile markers 33 and 52. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
